HumanFootprint
==============

Category: **Covariates**

Human Footprint Data

Global human footprint analysis at 1km resolution.

This dataset contains data with the following attributes:
  - Time Resolution: 1993
  - Spatial Resolution: 1 km
  - DOI: 10.5061/dryad.052q5
  - Link: https://datadryad.org/stash/dataset/doi:10.5061/dryad.052q5

Environment variables included:
-------------------------------------------------------------
$HumanFootprint_MAPS       Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/HumanFootprint/Maps
$HumanFootprint_MAPS_INFO  Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/HumanFootprint/Maps/info

$HumanFootprint_HOME       Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/HumanFootprint
$HumanFootprint_ROOT       Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/HumanFootprint
$HumanFootprint_VERSION    Version: 2016-11-17

Tips:
- Use echo $ENV_NAME to check the environment value.
- To see all environment variables related to HumanFootprint, you can load the module then use: env | grep HumanFootprint
- To unload the module and remove the environment settings: module unload HumanFootprint
-------------------------------------------------------------

Environment Variables
---------------------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1
   :widths: 25 75

   * - **Variable Name**
     - **Value**
   * - ``HumanFootprint_MAPS``
     - ``modroot.."/Maps"``
   * - ``HumanFootprint_MAPS_INFO``
     - ``modroot.."/Maps/info"``
   * - ``HumanFootprint_HOME``
     - ``modroot``
   * - ``RCAC_HumanFootprint_ROOT``
     - ``modroot``
   * - ``RCAC_HumanFootprint_VERSION``
     - ``2016-11-17``
